author: ASUS ROG Maximus Z890 Extreme
text: High-end motherboard featuring the Z890 chipset, Thunderbolt 5, four NVMe slots, and next-gen Wi-Fi 7 support.

author: AMD Ryzen 9 9950X
text: A flagship 16-core processor based on the Zen 5+ architecture, featuring expanded cache, DDR6, and PCIe 6.0 support.

author: Corsair Dominator Titanium DDR6 9600 MHz (32GBx2)
text: Ultra-fast DDR6 RAM kit with 9600 MHz speed, iCUE RGB lighting, and automatic overclocking profiles.

author: Intel Core Ultra 10 15900K
text: A 24-core Ultra 10th Gen CPU with enhanced energy efficiency, LPDDR6 support, and an integrated neural engine for AI processing.

author: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 5090 Ti
text: Next-gen graphics card with 48GB of GDDR7 memory, 4th-gen ray tracing cores, and DLSS 5 AI acceleration.
